title: NOD

hero.headline: Save Articles, Unlock Insights
hero.description: NOD uses AI to analyze and summarize articles, building your personal knowledge library that you can search and reference anytime.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.headline: Pick a plan that fits your reading flow
pricing.description: Start with Basic, then upgrade to Pro when you want unlimited summaries and higher-quality models.

features.label: Features
features.headline: Everything you need to manage knowledge

aiSummary.title: AI Summaries
aiSummary.description: Get instant AI-generated summaries of any article, highlighting key points and insights.

vectorSearch.title: Semantic Search
vectorSearch.description: Find articles by meaning, not just keywords. Our vector search understands what you're looking for.

chromeExtension.title: Chrome Extension
chromeExtension.description: Save articles with one click from your browser. No copy-pasting required.

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform
multiPlatform.description: Access your knowledge library from web, mobile, or browser extension.

concepts.title: Concept Extraction
concepts.description: Automatically identify and tag key concepts, themes, and topics from your articles.

multilingual.title: Multilingual
multilingual.description: Save and analyze articles in any language. AI summaries available in your preferred language.

howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.headline: Three simple steps to smarter reading

save.title: Save
save.description: Save any article from the web with our Chrome extension or by pasting a URL.

analyze.title: Analyze
analyze.description: AI automatically summarizes the article, extracts key concepts, and organizes it in your library.

recall.title: Recall
recall.description: Search your library semantically to find exactly what you need, when you need it.

cta.headline: Start building your knowledge library
cta.description: Join thousands of readers who use NOD to save, analyze, and recall articles with AI.

footer.tagline: AI-powered article saving and knowledge management.

intro.title: 1. Purpose
intro.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern the legal relationship between NOD ("we", "us", or "our") and users ("you") of the NOD service. These Terms define the rights and obligations of both parties. By accessing or using the NOD service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please discontinue use of the service.

account.title: 2. Account
account.content: You may create an account using your email address or a supported social login provider (e.g., Google). You are responsible for providing accurate and up-to-date information and for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your account credentials. You must notify us promptly at shickcoong777@gmail.com if you suspect unauthorized access to your account. Each individual may maintain only one account. Account sharing or transferring access to third parties is not permitted.

service.title: 3. Service Use
service.content: NOD provides an AI-powered knowledge management service including article saving, AI-generated summarization, semantic search, and concept extraction. We may update, modify, or discontinue features of the service at any time with reasonable notice. The service is offered in two tiers: a free Basic plan and a paid Pro plan ($5/month). All use of the service is subject to fair use guidelines; excessive automated use that degrades service performance for other users is not permitted.

payment.title: 4. Payment Processing
payment.content: Payments for paid services (Pro plan) are processed through Paddle.com. Paddle acts as the Merchant of Record, handling payment processing, tax collection, and refunds. For payment-related inquiries, please contact shickcoong777@gmail.com or Paddle's customer support.

content.title: 5. Content & Copyright
content.content: You retain full ownership and copyright of all content you save to NOD. By saving content to the service, you grant NOD a limited, non-exclusive license to store, process, and analyze that content solely for the purpose of providing the service to you. NOD does not claim ownership of your content and will not use it for any purpose beyond service provision. You are responsible for ensuring you have the necessary rights to save and process any content through NOD. NOD reserves the right to remove content that violates these Terms or applicable law.

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Acts
prohibited.content: The following activities are strictly prohibited: (a) reverse engineering, decompiling, or attempting to extract the source code of the service; (b) circumventing or attempting to bypass any access controls or security measures; (c) automated scraping or crawling of the service beyond normal use through the official interface or API; (d) sharing account credentials or allowing others to use your account; (e) uploading or transmitting malicious code, viruses, or any harmful content; (f) using the service in violation of any applicable local, national, or international law; (g) taking any action that interferes with or disrupts the normal operation of the service or its infrastructure.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: You may cancel your account at any time through the account settings or by contacting us. NOD may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms, engage in fraudulent activity, or otherwise misuse the service. Upon termination, your data may be retained for a reasonable period before permanent deletion, unless you request immediate deletion. Provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination (including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, and limitations of liability) shall survive termination.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at shickcoong777@gmail.com. We aim to respond to all inquiries within 3 business days.

refund.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
refund.intro: Our policy regarding refunds and cancellations for NOD's paid plan (Pro). All payments are processed through Paddle.com.

cancellation.title: 1. Subscription Cancellation
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Upon cancellation, you will retain access to Pro features until the end of your current billing period. No further charges will be made.

refunds.title: 2. Refund Policy
refunds.content: You may request a full refund within 14 days of your subscription renewal date or initial purchase date. After 14 days, refunds are not available; however, you may cancel your subscription at any time. Payments are processed through Paddle, and Paddle's refund policy applies.

process.title: 3. Refund Processing
process.content: Once approved, refunds will be processed to your original payment method within 5-10 business days. You can submit refund requests via shickcoong777@gmail.com or through Paddle's customer support.

exceptions.title: 4. Exceptions
exceptions.content: If the service is unusable due to a critical defect, a full refund will be provided regardless of the time elapsed since purchase.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: NOD respects your privacy. This policy explains what personal information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following categories of information:

items.account: Account information: Email address, name and profile image (as provided by social login provider), authentication tokens.
items.content: Content information: Saved article URLs, titles, extracted text, AI-generated summaries, notes, and related metadata.
items.usage: Usage information: Feature usage logs (e.g., save/summarize counts), error and diagnostic data.
items.payment: Payment information: Billing data for paid plans, processed by our payment provider (Paddle).
items.analytics: Web analytics: Website usage statistics (e.g., page views and events via Google Analytics).

collection.note: When using the Chrome extension, we may collect the URL and body text of pages you choose to save.

items.auth: User identification, login, and session management
items.core: Providing core features including article saving, AI summarization, semantic search, and concept extraction
items.improve: Service quality improvement, error analysis, security, and fraud prevention

sharing.title: 3. Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We use trusted third-party service providers to operate and improve the service.

items.cloud: Cloud infrastructure and hosting: Service operation, data storage, and processing
items.auth: Authentication: Social login (OAuth) providers and authentication services
items.ai: AI processing: Article content (titles, text) may be sent to AI providers (e.g., OpenAI, Google Gemini) for summarization and embedding generation
items.payment: Payment processing: Paddle and related payment services
items.analytics: Analytics and monitoring: Google Analytics and similar tools

items.principle: We delete personal data when it is no longer needed for its original purpose.
items.deletion: When you delete your account or request deletion, your data will be removed within a reasonable period.
items.legal: We may retain data longer where required by applicable law.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies for authentication, session management, user preferences, and analytics. You can configure your browser to reject cookies, but some features may be limited.

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal data, including access controls, encryption in transit, and secure data storage practices.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content:
For questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at:
Email: shickcoong777@gmail.com

changes.title: 9. Changes
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through in-service announcements or direct communication.

loginSubtitle: Sign in to your NOD account

overview.viewArticlesDescription: Browse and search your saved articles.
overview.manageBillingDescription: View your plan and usage details.
overview.installExtensionDescription: Save articles in one click while you browse.

graph.pageDescription: Visualize core concepts across your summarized articles.
graph.previewDescription: Read-only preview of your concept map.
graph.lockedTitle: Graph View is a Pro feature
graph.lockedDescription: Upgrade to Pro to unlock concept graph visualization.
graph.empty: No concept graph yet. Save and summarize more articles.
graph.localCenterFilteredMessage: The current filters exclude your local center node.

dashboard.searchMinChars: Type at least 2 characters to search
dashboard.noArticles: No articles yet. Save articles using the Chrome extension.

subscription.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
subscription.upgradePrompt: Upgrade to Pro for more summaries
subscription.cancelDescription: If you cancel, your Pro features will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
subscription.checkoutSuccess: Payment successful! Your Pro subscription is now active.

planDescription.basic: Perfect for casual readers who want to try AI-powered article management.
planDescription.pro: For power users who save and analyze articles daily.

faqItems.q1: What do I get with Pro?
faqItems.a1: Unlimited AI summaries and unlimited article storage.
faqItems.a2: Yes, you can cancel anytime. You'll keep Pro features until the end of your billing period.
faqItems.a3: We support credit cards, debit cards, and more. Payments are securely processed via Paddle.
